panels.description: The number of pods that are up and ready for processing
panels.title: Ready Pods

panels.description: The average amount of time all scenarios have been actively publishing transactions
panels.title: Publish Duration

panels.description: The average amount of time all clients have been subscribed
panels.title: Subscribe Duration

panels.description: The average time from submit to handle transaction
panels.title: Submit to Handle

panels.description: The average end to end latency of the entire system
panels.title: E2E

panels.description: The number of transactions per second published broken down by type
panels.title: Publish TPS

panels.description: How long the publish scenario has been active
panels.title: Publish Duration

panels.description: The number of errors per second when submitting transactions
panels.title: Publish Error Rate

panels.description: How long it took to submit the transaction to the main node
panels.title: Publish Latency

panels.description: The time it takes from submit to being handled by the main nodes
panels.title: Publish to Handled Latency

panels.description: The number of transactions per second received broken down by scenario
panels.title: Subscribe TPS

panels.description: How long it took to submit the transaction to the main node and receive it back from the mirror node
panels.title: End to End Latency

panels.description: How long the subscribe scenario has been active
panels.title: Subscribe Duration

panels.description: The number of requests per second for more data
panels.title: Request Rate

panels.description: Times the duration elapsed between a subscription and the termination or cancellation of the sequence
panels.title: Flow Duration

panels.description: Measures delays between onNext signals (or between onSubscribe and first onNext)
panels.title: onNext Delay

list.description: Name of the Loki datasource to use
list.label: Loki
list.name: loki

list.description: Name of the Prometheus datasource to use
list.label: Prometheus
list.name: prometheus
